pkgmetadata.longdescription: Companion Datasets and Functions for Blair, Coppock, and Humphreys (2022) "Research Design: Declare, Diagnose, Redesign" // Helper functions to accompany the Blair, Coppock, and Humphreys (2022) "Research Design: Declare, Diagnose, Redesign" https://book.declaredesign.org. 'rdddr' includes datasets, helper functions, and plotting components to enable use and replication of the book.
